## WorkspaceSvg.createDom() method

Create the workspace DOM elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_backgroundClass | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Either 'blocklyMainBackground' or 'blocklyMutatorBackground'. |
